experiences.title: Software Development Engineer
experiences.description: Refined data processing in model build and analysis pipeline, transforming raw data into inferred values with comprehensive automated unit and integration testing. Optimized system scalability through time complexity improvements, enhancing overall performance. Troubleshot and resolved model build pipeline failures in staging and production environments using CloudWatch logs. Streamlined and automated DevOps processes by restructuring CI/CD workflows with GitHub Actions. Implemented data export/import functionality for timeseries data purge and restore, improving database efficiency and data lifecycle management.
experiences.reasoning: This is a comprehensive role at NREL where Mukul worked on software development and DevOps processes, which fits the experience section of a resume.

experiences.title: Graduate Services Assistant
experiences.company: Ira A. Fulton Schools of Engineering, Arizona State University
experiences.description: Grader for CSE 536 Advanced Operating Systems course (Spring 2023) under the School of Computing and Augmented Intelligence (SCAI). Responsibilities included preparing and reviewing coursework, assisting students during office hours, and grading assignments.
experiences.reasoning: Experience as a Graduate Assistant involved academic responsibilities, suitable for the resume's experience section.

experiences.title: Software Development Engineer
experiences.description: Implemented OFSAA LLFP fintech solutions in SIT, UAT and provided post-implementation support in production environments for international banking firms. Engineered GUI workflows for ETL pipelines, enhanced UI for the Individual Assessment module, and generated PL/SQL scripts for data manipulation and validation.
experiences.reasoning: This role at Oracle involved significant software engineering and database management, pertinent to the work experience section.

experiences.title: Embedded C++ Developer
experiences.description: Designed software modules for ARM Cortex-M3 embedded server sensor device to measure subzero temperatures. Troubleshot bugs and optimized the system to handle real-time sensor data via RPC transfer protocols.
experiences.reasoning: The role involved embedded systems development, a key technical skill, making it relevant to the resume's experience section.

experiences.title: Python Developer
experiences.description: Modeled discrete mathematical Rough Set Theory concepts for sensor data mining using Python. Designed a custom-built library to process 65,536 objects in 2 minutes with an accuracy of 95% using linear regression.
experiences.reasoning: This internship involved significant software development and data processing, which is relevant to the experience section.
